items.title: GMR Airports stock gets buy rating from Jefferies on 10% stake grab in DIAL
items.description: GMR Airports Infrastructure shares will be in focus after announcing the acquisition of a 10 percent stake in Delhi International Airport Ltd (DIAL) for $126 million.

items.title: CLSA maintains 'outperform' call on ICICI Bank, sees 21% potential upside
items.description: The reiteration of bullish stance comes as analysts feel that the private sector lender is well placed on the deposits front

items.title: Bikaji Goods, Gopal Snacks stocks in focus as GST Council cuts rates on namkeen
items.description: At Monday's 54th GST Council meeting, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman announced that the GST rate on such products has been reduced prospectively to 12 percent from 18 percent earlier

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty indicates a positive start; US, Asian markets gain
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Wall Street's three major indexes gained more than 1% on Monday as investors looked for bargains after the previous week's sell-off while they also waited for inflation reports in coming days and the Federal Reserve's next policy decision next week.

items.title: HG Infra in focus as it bags Rs 781 crore contract to upgrade NH 47 in Gujarat
items.description: The contract involves upgrading a 10.630 km stretch of National Highway 47 (NH-47) in Gujarat, specifically between Narol and Sarkhej junctions

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty indicates a positive start; US, Asian markets gain
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Wall Street's three major indexes gained more than 1% on Monday as investors looked for bargains after the previous week's sell-off while they also waited for inflation reports in coming days and the Federal Reserve's next policy decision next week.

items.title: Agri Picks Report September 10, 2024: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit, India remained the largest buyer of Australian chickpeas in July, with over 64% share in total chana exports from the country.

items.title: Suzlon Energy stock gains 4% after Morgan Stanley reaffirms 'Overweight' on massive order win
items.description: Suzlon Energy shares gained over 4 percent after securing a 1.17 GW wind energy order from NTPC, with Morgan Stanley maintaining an 'Overweight' rating and a target price of Rs 73.

items.title: IRB Infra stock gains 3% after toll collections rise 20% in August
items.description: IRB Infra generated maximum toll revenue from two of its wholly-owned subsidiaries-IRB MP Expressway and IRB Ahmedabad Vadodara Super Express Tollway which accounted for collections worth a total of Rs 199.6 crore in August.

items.title: Ahluwalia Contracts surges over 6% on securing Rs 1,144-crore order from Signature Global
items.description: The project, titled "De-luxe DXP," will be located in Sector 37D, Dwarka Expressway, Gurugram, and is expected to be completed within a five-year regulatory timeframe

items.title: Pharma stocks gain on GST tax cut on cancer drugs, passage of draft US Biosecure Act
items.description: The Indian GST council cut taxes on cancer drugs while the US government passed the draft Biosecure Act targeting Chinese  biotech companies.

items.title: IREDA stock jumps 6% following MoU with SJVN, GMR Energy for 900 MW Nepal hydro project
items.description: IREDA shares surged following the signing of a MoU with SJVN Ltd. and GMR Energy Ltd. for the development of the 900 MW Upper Karnali hydro-electric project in Nepal.

items.title: Buy Persistent Systems; target of Rs 6200: Sharekhan
items.description: Sharekhan is bullish on Persistent Systems has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 6200 in its research report dated September 09, 2024.

items.title: Will the IPO of PN Gadgil Jewellers shine on bourses?
items.description: The transition from a family-run business to a professionally-managed organisation will lead to a valuation re-rating

items.title: Suzlon stock worth Rs 254 crore sold in large trades; 3.7 crore share change hands
items.description: Suzlon stock saw a 3.7 crore shares being sold at Rs 77 per share in large deals, a day after a significant 1.17 GW order win from NTPC Green.

items.title: Paytm shares soar 8 percent on heavy buying; up 80% in six months
items.description: Paytm shares surged over 8 percent, driven by high trading volumes and no announcement of GST levy on UPI transactions below Rs 2,000.

items.title: Premier Energies extends bull run to 9th day; soars 181% from IPO price
items.description: A recent order win, combined with draft norms for an approved list of models and manufacturers (ALMM) for solar cells, are recent triggers fuelling the upswing in Premier Energies.

items.title: Family offices bet big on startups: From burgers to space-tech, here are the top picks
items.description: Data from Tracxn shows that start-ups like quick service restaurant chain Burger Singh, eco-friendly footwear brand Neemanâ€™s, non-alcoholic beer brand Coolberg, online-jewellery brand Bluestone and space-tech startup Agnikul Cosmos, which focuses on developing launch vehicles, among others have attracted investments from many family offices

items.title: ECOS Mobility hits new record high as Plutus Wealth buys 4 lakh shares; stock up 34% since listing
items.description: ECOS Mobility has rallied over 57 percent from its issue price of Rs 334 on the upper price band

items.title: Analyst Call Tracker Aug 2024: Apollo HospitalsÂ falls out ofÂ favour in last one month despiteÂ upbeat growth narrative
items.description: Despite delivering better-than-expected results that gave investors plenty to rejoice, Apollo Hospitals stock still managed to snag the top spot on Moneycontrol's list of most downgraded stocks over the past month. Quite the plot twist!

items.title: Tata Power stock surges 6% after subsidiary commences solar cell production
items.description: Tata Power shares after its subsidiary, TP Solar, commenced commercial production of solar cells at Indiaâ€™s largest solar cell plant in Tirunelveli, Tamil Nadu, boosting domestic solar manufacturing capacity.

items.title: Accumulate Anupam Rasayan India; target of Rs 810: KR Choksey
items.description: KR Choksey recommended accumulate rating on Anupam Rasayan India with a target price of Rs 810 in its research report dated August 27, 2024.

items.title: Inox Wind stock jumps 4% to fresh record high; multibagger up 366% in a year
items.description: Inox Wind shares surged to a fresh record high on strong volumes, driven by broader market momentum and positive sentiment around its debt-free status and growth prospects.

items.title: Gainers & Losers: Top stocks that moved the most on September 10
items.description: Most sectors ended in the green, barring oil and gas, with information technology taking the lead, followed by pharma. The Nifty IT index surged nearly 2 percent while Nifty Pharma was up over 1 percent.

items.title: Bikaji Foods, Gopal Snacks stocks soar 5% as GST Council cuts rates on namkeen
items.description: At Monday's 54th GST Council meeting, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman announced that the GST rate on such products has been reduced prospectively to 12 percent from 18 percent earlier

items.title: DIIs net sell shares worth Rs 275 crore, FIIs buy Rs 2208 crore
items.description: In the year so far, FIIs have net sold shares worth Rs 1.34 lakh crore, while DIIs have bought shares worth Rs 3.47 lakh crore.

items.title: Block deals: Dodona Holdings sells 1.19 lakh shares of Trent
items.description: Promoter's Neerav Apurva Parekh and Kalpana Apurva Parekh also sold 4 lakh shares of Pidilite Industries.
